paysServiceCharges.legend: Do you pay any service charges?

hint.caretakerServices: caretaker services like gardening, maintenance and cleaning of communal areas
hint.communalAreas: use of communal areas like a lounge or TV area

paysServiceCharges.required: Select yes if you pay any service charges.
paysServiceCharges.change: Change whether you pay any service charges

serviceChargesAmount.label: How much do you pay in service charges each month?
serviceChargesAmount.required: Enter how much you pay in service charges each month.
serviceChargesAmount.format: Enter how much you pay in service charges using only a £ symbol, numbers, commas and a decimal point. For example £1000 or £1,000.00.
serviceChargesAmount.change: Change how much you pay in service charges each month
